mapper.sql: self.RECONCILIATION_DEDUCTION_ID, self.RECONCILIATION_ID, self.RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID, self.DEDUCTION_ID, self.DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, self.CREATOR, self.CREATE_DATE, self.CORP_ID, self.FLAG, deduction.DEDUCTION_NAME as refDeductionName, user.USER_NAME as refCreatorName, corp.CORP_NAME as refCorpName

where self.DEL = 0 and self.RECONCILIATION_DEDUCTION_ID = #{reconciliationDeductionId} and self.RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId} and self.RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID = #{reconciliationDetailId} and self.DEDUCTION_ID = #{deductionId} and self.DEDUCTION_AMOUNT = #{deductionAmount} and self.CREATOR = #{creator} and self.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and self.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and self.FLAG = #{flag}
mapper.select: select from fs_customer_reconciliation_deduction self left join bd_deduction deduction on self.DEDUCTION_ID = deduction.DEDUCTION_ID left join bd_user user on self.CREATOR = user.USER_ID left join sys_corp corp on self.CORP_ID = corp.CORP_id where self.RECONCILIATION_DEDUCTION_ID = #{reconciliationDeductionId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and self.DEL = 0
mapper.insert: insert into fs_customer_reconciliation_deduction (RECONCILIATION_ID, RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID, DEDUCTION_ID, DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG) values (#{reconciliationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reconciliationDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deductionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into fs_customer_reconciliation_deduction RECONCILIATION_ID, RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID, DEDUCTION_ID, DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG, #{reconciliationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reconciliationDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deductionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update fs_customer_reconciliation_deduction RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID = #{reconciliationDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DEDUCTION_ID = #{deductionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DEDUCTION_AMOUNT = #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where RECONCILIATION_DEDUCTION_ID = #{reconciliationDeductionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update fs_customer_reconciliation_deduction set RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID = #{reconciliationDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DEDUCTION_ID = #{deductionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DEDUCTION_AMOUNT = #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where RECONCILIATION_DEDUCTION_ID = #{reconciliationDeductionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from fs_customer_reconciliation_deduction self left join bd_deduction deduction on self.DEDUCTION_ID = deduction.DEDUCTION_ID left join bd_user user on self.CREATOR = user.USER_ID left join sys_corp corp on self.CORP_ID = corp.CORP_id order by self.CREATE_DATE DESC

select from fs_customer_reconciliation_deduction self left join bd_deduction deduction on self.DEDUCTION_ID = deduction.DEDUCTION_ID left join bd_user user on self.CREATOR = user.USER_ID left join sys_corp corp on self.CORP_ID = corp.CORP_id where self.RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId} and self.DEL = 0

select from fs_customer_reconciliation_deduction self left join bd_deduction deduction on self.DEDUCTION_ID = deduction.DEDUCTION_ID left join bd_user user on self.CREATOR = user.USER_ID left join sys_corp corp on self.CORP_ID = corp.CORP_id where self.RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID = #{reconciliationId} and self.DEL = 0
mapper.update: update fs_customer_reconciliation_deduction self set self.DEL = 1 where self.RECONCILIATION_DEDUCTION_ID = #{reconciliationDeductionId}
mapper.delete: delete from fs_customer_reconciliation_deduction where RECONCILIATION_DEDUCTION_ID in #{reconciliationDeductionId}
